stanzas: He shall feed his flock like a shepherd. He shall gather the lambs in his arms, and carry them in his bosom, and shall gently feed those who are with young.
He shall feed his flock like a shepherd. He shall gather the lambs in his arms, and carry them in his bosom, and shall gently feed those who are with young.
And carry them in his bosom, and shall gently feed those who are with young.
